Specimen Type: Body fluids (e.g., cerebrospinal, pleural, peritoneal, pericardial, synovial)
Purpose: To perform accurate morphologic evaluation of cellular elements in body fluids for hematopathologic diagnosis.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container with proper labeling
Equipment: Centrifuge, cytocentrifuge, light microscope, Wright-Giemsa staining equipment
